  • FAX/MODEM tone detection
FAX Tones, signals and events

CNG (Calling tone)

1100 Hz, ON for 0.5 second, OFF for 3 seconds.

CED (Called terminal identification answer tone,)

2100 Hz +/- 15 Hz tone, ON for 2.6 to 4.0 seconds. CCITT Recommendation V.23

DIS (Digital Identification Signal)

Characterizes the standard ITU-T capabilities of the called terminal.

DCN (Disconnect)

This command indicates the initiation of phase E (call release). This command requires no response.
